original_text: He must break the cake into pieces. He must pour oil on it. It is a gift to God.
korean_text: 조각으로 나누고 그 위에 기름을 부을지니 이는 소제니라

sentences.original_text: He must break the cake into pieces.
He must pour oil on it.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 위에 기름을 부어야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: It is a gift to God.
